```{python}
import pandas as pd
import numpy as np

np.random.seed(42)
data = pd.DataFrame(np.random.rand(100), columns=['Random Numbers'])

def preview_data(df, material):
    head = df.head() # Get the first few rows of the DataFrame
    description = df.describe()  # Get the descriptive statistics
    return [material, description]

result = preview_data(data, "Random Number Data")
print(result)
```
